actionReference.title: actionReference

externalIdentification.description: An external identifier for an action defined shared between data supplier and recepient during the Traffic Management Plan design phase.

description.description: Description of the action in natural language.

ActivationConditions.title: ActivationConditions
ActivationConditions.description: Conditions governing the activation of a traffic management response element

automaticallyApproved.title: automaticallyApproved
automaticallyApproved.description: Whether the association traffic management response element shall be automatically approved for implementation when the specified sccenario occurs and any specified trigger conditions are met. If false then manual approval is needed before implementation.

automaticallyImplemented.title: automaticallyImplemented
automaticallyImplemented.description: Whether the associated traffic management response element is automatically implemented (after acceptance). If false, further triggering will be needed to fully implement the response.

automaticallyDeactivated.title: automaticallyDeactivated
automaticallyDeactivated.description: Whether the traffic management response elements that have been implemented are automatically deactivated.

ActivationDelay.title: ActivationDelay
ActivationDelay.description: Intentional delays between trigger condition being met and a traffic management action or measure being implemented or deactivated.

activationDelay.title: activationDelay
activationDelay.description: Intentional delay between trigger condition being met and a traffic management action or measure being implemented

deactivationDelay.title: deactivationDelay
deactivationDelay.description: Intentional delay between trigger condition being met and a traffic management action or measure being deactivated.

CompositeMeasure.title: CompositeMeasure
CompositeMeasure.description: Measure that consists of a number of Measures

versionTime.title: versionTime
versionTime.description: Time stamp indicating when this version of the measure was created or updated.

measure.title: measure
measure.description: Measures that make up the composite measure. Where processing order is important and is not entailed by specified timing, the collection of Measure objects should be ordered to indicate processing order.

targetLocation.description: Location that is the target of the operator action

creationTime.description: Creation time of the Traffic Management Plan life cycle, i.e. the time when either an agreement or an implementation was requested.

expiryTime.description: A timestamp after which the Traffic Management Plan is no further to be implemented.

status.title: status
status.description: The operational status of the Traffic Management Plan.

statusReason.description: Textual description for the reason of the current Traffic Management Plan operation status.

versionTime.description: Timestamp for this current version of the operational status.

involvedRoadOperatorConsensusRate.description: Ratio of agreement to participation of all partners affected by the TMP in the coordination process. Partners are those organisations whose approval is required to enact the TMP.

nonPredefinedScenarioDescription.description: Description of the non-predefined scenario in natural language

actionImplementingSituationRecord.description: Reference to a situationRecord which has been created to implement the requested action by the action implementer.

involvedRoadOperatorConsensusRate.description: Ratio of agreement to participation of all partners affected by the TMP in the coordination process. Partners are those organisations whose approval is required to enact the TMP.

automaticallyInitiated.description: Defines whether the network management is initiated by an automatic system.

name.title: name
name.description: A given name for the specific route management.

bindingTrafficRegulation.title: bindingTrafficRegulation
bindingTrafficRegulation.description: Indicates that the rerouting information is a binding traffic regulation (i.e. shall be followed).

preventiveMeasure.title: preventiveMeasure
preventiveMeasure.description: Indicates an action that is taken in advance (e.g. before an incident or traffic disruption occurs).

targetLocation.title: targetLocation
targetLocation.description: Location that is the target of the operator action

forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf.description: Characteristics of vehicles to which the network management applies

routingOrigin.title: routingOrigin
routingOrigin.description: A location serving as a geo-filter for routing itineraries that have their starting point within this location and for which this rerouting management should become applicable.

routingThrough.title: routingThrough
routingThrough.description: A location serving as a geo-filter for routing itineraries that touch or pass through this location and for which this rerouting management should become applicable.

routingDestination.title: routingDestination
routingDestination.description: A location serving as a geo-filter for routing itineraries that have their end point within this location and for which this rerouting management should become applicable.

originalRoute.title: originalRoute
originalRoute.description: The original route, for which alternative routes are specified, which may be congested, blocked or closed.

alternativeRoute.title: alternativeRoute
alternativeRoute.description: An alternative route on the transport network that provides a functionally equivalent but distinct route from the original route.

ResponseEffectTypeEnum.description: Type of effect that a traffic management response is intended to have.

Scenario.title: Scenario
Scenario.description: Predefined kind of road network situation with potential impact that would lead road operators to initiate traffic management. Identifies a subset of possible traffic situations. May be arbitrarily specific yet not fixed to a specific instance in time.

externalIdentification.title: externalIdentification
externalIdentification.description: An external identifier for a Traffic Management Plan scenario, defined during the Traffic Management Plan design phase.

versionTime.title: versionTime
versionTime.description: Time stamp indicating when this version of the scenario was created or updated.

description.title: description
description.description: Description of Traffic Management Plan scenario in natural language.

situationType.title: situationType
situationType.description: The type(s) of situation that this scenario represents

emergencyServicesAccessibility.title: emergencyServicesAccessibility
emergencyServicesAccessibility.description: Description of whether and how the emergency services can still use the road network in this scenario

scenarioDirector.title: scenarioDirector
scenarioDirector.description: Organisation responsible for directing the scenario

situationFilter.title: situationFilter
situationFilter.description: Filter expressions for traffic related situations to trigger this scenario. The filter language/expressions have to be defined individually.

strategy.title: strategy
strategy.description: Traffic anagement strategies in response to the scenario. Where processing order is important and is not entailed by timing specifications, the collection of Strategy objects should be ordered to indicate processing order.

problemLocation.title: problemLocation
problemLocation.description: Location of the problem in this scenario

scheduledScenarioValidity.title: scheduledScenarioValidity
scheduledScenarioValidity.description: the time period(s) in which the scenario applies

situationTypeDetail.title: situationTypeDetail
situationTypeDetail.description: The specific kind(s) of situation which the scenario represents.

StrategyDefinition.description: Element of a Traffic Management Plan table which refers to the definition of a strategy.

versionTime.title: versionTime

externalIdentification.title: externalIdentification
externalIdentification.description: An external identifier for a strategy defined shared between data supplier and recipient during the Traffic Management Plan design phase.

description.title: description
description.description: Description of the strategy in natural language.

priority.title: priority
priority.description: Priority of this strategy compared to all other strategies that may exist. The higher the number, the higher the priority.

strategyMeasure.title: strategyMeasure
strategyMeasure.description: A Measure and how it is to be used in this strategy. Where processing order is important and this is not entailed by specified timing, the collection of StrategyMeasure objects should be ordered to indicate processing order.

overallActivation.title: overallActivation
overallActivation.description: conditions for the activation of the Strategy overall

StrategyMeasure.title: StrategyMeasure
StrategyMeasure.description: A measure and how it is to be used within context of a strategy

processingIndex.title: processingIndex
processingIndex.description: Indicates the order of processing of Measures within a Strategy. When implementing the Strategy, the Measure for a StrategyMeasure with a low processing index should be processed before that for a StrategyMeasure with a higher processing index.

essentialForStrategy.title: essentialForStrategy
essentialForStrategy.description: Whether the Measure is essential for this Strategy, i.e. whether if the Measure cannot be implemented then the Stragegy shall not be implemented (or if running, shall not continue).

activationConditions.title: activationConditions
activationConditions.description: Activation conditions for the measure within the associated strategy. For that strategy only, these take precedence over any activation conditions specified by the Measure.
